job_title: Technical Architect / Manager (J2EE, AWS Services, SRE Practice, Gen AI)- Insurance Domain

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in computer science from a reputed university

jd: From: Bhavya Rapelli, Avance bhavya.r@avanceservices.com Reply to: bhavya.r@avanceservices.com (Posting).Job Title: Technical Architect / Manager (J2EE, AWS Services, SRE Practice, Gen AI)- Insurance DomainPosition Type: Contract to Hire (CTH)Location: San Antonio, TXExperience: Architect Level (18 Years – 22 Years)Overview: Senior Technical Manager A highly skilled and experienced Technical Manager with a robust background in JAVAJ2EE and cloud technologies. With a proven track record of managing and delivering complex transformation projects, this professional excels in leading cross-functional teams and driving technological innovations to streamline business processes and enhance overall operational efficiency. Professional Experience Management and Leadership Over 15 years of experience in technical management, with a focus on JAVAJ2EE and cloud-based solutions implementation. Successfully led multiple transformation projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to budget constraints.Technical Skills Programming Languages: JAVA, J2EE, SQL, JavaScript Frameworks: Spring, Hibernate, Struts, Angular Cloud Platforms: AWS, Openshift Tools: Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Git Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB Project Management: Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Junit/Mockito, React.JS/ Redux, Flux, AWS Services (AWS EKS, AWS S3 Bucket, EC2 Instances, RDS, Lambda Function), SQS, SNS, Dynamo DB, AWS EKS. Cloud Certification (AWS Certification), Gen AIKey Skillset Required & Responsibilities:Expertise in agile methodologies and project management frameworks to optimize workflows and team collaboration. Proficient in mentoring and guiding technical teams, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.Should have Led digital transformation projects with focus on operational efficiencies Coordinated with stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables, ensuring alignment with business goals.Should have managed multi-geo delivery programs and exposure to operating and scalable delivery models Exposure to GenAI and latest technologies is a plus.Technical Expertise required Extensive experience in developing and deploying enterprise-level applications using JAVA/J2EE technologies.Strong knowledge of various JAVA frameworks, including Spring, Hibernate, and Struts.Skilled in designing scalable and secure applications, ensuring high performance and reliability.Adept at troubleshooting and resolving complex technical issues, enhancing system stability and efficiency.Comprehensive understanding of cloud platforms such as AWS and Services.Experience in migrating on-premises applications to the cloud, leveraging cloud-native services for optimization.Proficient in implementing cloud security best practices to safeguard sensitive data and ensure compliance.Ability to design and manage cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and cost-effectiveness and Certifications bachelor’s degree in computer science from a reputed university. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) AWS Certified Solutions Architect (1)
